author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: ... أوّل الأمر عرفان اللّه وآخره هو التّمسّك بما نزل من سمآء مشيّته المهيمنة علی من في السّموات والأرضين ...
translation: The beginning of all things is the knowledge of God, and the end of all things is strict observance of whatsoever hath been sent down from the empyrean of the Divine Will that pervadeth all that is in the heavens and all that is on the earth.
